attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The T.V licence currently costs £139.50 for a colour licence and for a licence fot a black and white television the current cost is £47.00. I belive that it is a ridiculious amount to pay to be able to watch a T.V, it is just inaffordable, at the very least there should be a limit introduced limiting the price.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
